content.text:
# R. Visweswaran

}}
R. Visweswaran (1944- present) is an Indian classical carnatic musician who plays Veena and a professional vocalist.
Visweswaran belongs to a family of musicians, and is the nephew of G.N. Balasubramaniam. He is trained to play carnatic music on the veena by Shivkumar Sharma. He performed internationally was a graded artist of All India Radio.

*[https://starofmysore.com/akademi-ratna-award-for-veena-exponent-prof-r-visweswaran/ Akademi Ratna Award for Veena exponent Prof. R. Visweswaran]
